text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e890b9f5dd3ae76e301b2df7f3151366acaba5dc|patch 8.1.2247: "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc>
patch 8.1.2247: "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc

Problem:    "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc.
Solution:   Test existence with "which" instead of "test -x". (Ken Takata)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2247: "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc · vim/vim@e890b9f
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2247: "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc · vim/vim@e890b9f
attachments.text: Problem: "make vimtags" does not work in runtime/doc. Solution: Test existence with "which" instead of "test -x". (Ken Takata)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1e814bc017907209a66af82f8fb76c6d1fc324aa|patch 8.1.2248: CTRL-W dot does not work when modifyOtherKeys is enabled>
patch 8.1.2248: CTRL-W dot does not work when modifyOtherKeys is enabled

Problem:    CTRL-W dot does not work in a terminal when modifyOtherKeys is
            enabled.
Solution:   Use the modifier when needed.  Pass the modifier along with the
            key to avoid mistakes.

patch 8.1.2249: "make vimtags" does not print any message

Problem:    "make vimtags" does not print any message.
Solution:   Add a message that the tags have been updated.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2249: "make vimtags" does not print any message · vim/vim@d047840
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2249: "make vimtags" does not print any message · vim/vim@d047840
attachments.text: Problem: "make vimtags" does not print any message. Solution: Add a message that the tags have been updated.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/30efcf3d26bd14af71cd306c4c5f9e789a7130c9|patch 8.1.2250: CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window>
patch 8.1.2250: CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window

Problem:    CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window.
Solution:   Initialize 'scroll'.  Add "lastline" in popup_getpos().
            (closes #5170)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2250: CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window · vim/vim@30efcf3
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2250: CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window · vim/vim@30efcf3
attachments.text: Problem: CTRL-U and CTRL-D don't work in popup window. Solution: Initialize 'scroll'. Add "lastline" in popup_getpos(). (closes #5170)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/197c6b7da3ad4c3e3942a553f5dbc35722a4a349|patch 8.1.2251: ":term command" may not work without a shell>
patch 8.1.2251: ":term command" may not work without a shell

Problem:    ":term command" may not work without a shell.
Solution:   Add the ++shell option to :term. (closes #3340)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2251: ":term command" may not work without a shell · vim/vim@197c6b7
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2251: ":term command" may not work without a shell · vim/vim@197c6b7
attachments.text: Problem: ":term command" may not work without a shell. Solution: Add the ++shell option to :term. (closes #3340)
